title: Must Watch: Brendan Fairclough found guilty of possession of the new Scott Spark 900
content:
Brendan Fairclough has a dirty secret. Instead of pushing flat pedals like he’s supposed to, he’s secretly been clipping in aboard the new Scott Spark 900. Apparently, a secret sting operation caught him red-handed while stealing DH KOMs on an XC bike. Unacceptable.

Want to know more about the illicit bike in question? Make sure to check out Cory’s first look at the XC and “downcountry” capabilities of the new Scott Spark.
